asciiDocLines: When the vol1_spec_sdpi_p_option_discovery_proxy is enabled for a vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider Actor, then it shall use the vol2_clause_dev_46, DEV-46 transaction to update the vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy Actor on its network presence and departure.

When the vol1_spec_sdpi_p_option_discovery_proxy is enabled for a vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider Actor, then it should use the vol2_clause_dev_46, DEV-46 transaction to update the vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy Actor on its network presence and departure.
Let's start at the very beginning; a very good place to start!
